meanings: tears at the end of laughter

vlive.korean: 웃음상이요? The Funny Award? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
[의미심장한 웃음은 자이언티?!] [Is it Zion. T?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
내 웃음소리 왜 이래? Why do I laugh like that? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&휴닝카이 : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간
vlive.english: Why do I laugh like that?

vlive.korean: 아까 전에 공연 때 웃음 해 주면 안 돼요? Can't you do the smile from the concert? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 캐럿들~💎💖💙
vlive.english: Can't you do the smile from the concert?

vlive.korean: [웃음이 절로 나오는 결과물] 뭐지 이게? [Cracking out at her drawing] What is this? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "미나’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [Cracking out at her drawing] What is this?

examples.korean: He looked at her with an evil leer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 기분 나쁘게 음흉한 눈초리로[웃음을 머금고] 그녀를 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He looked at her with an evil leer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her laughter soon dissipated the tension in the air. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 웃음소리에 공기 중에 감돌던 긴장감이 곧 소멸되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her laughter soon dissipated the tension in the air. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The performance produced much mirth among the audience. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 공연은 청중들 사이에서 많은 웃음소리를 자아냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The performance produced much mirth among the audience. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He smiled, his eyes full of laughter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 두 눈에 웃음을 담뿍 담고 미소를 지었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He smiled, his eyes full of laughter. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a short / nervous / hearty laugh 듣기 Add to Wordbook 잠깐 웃음/초조한 웃음(소리)/마음껏 웃음 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
